contract_details.description: Comprehensive documentation consolidation focusing on eliminating duplicate documentation, standardizing formats, creating unified knowledge base, and ensuring single source of truth across all documentation.
contract_details.background: Following infrastructure consolidation success, Agent-2 is perfectly positioned to tackle the critical issue of documentation duplication that plagues the repository and creates maintenance overhead.
objectives: Audit all documentation files for duplication and redundancy
Consolidate duplicate documentation into unified sources
Create comprehensive knowledge base with cross-references
Establish documentation maintenance and update protocols
deliverables: Unified documentation repository with eliminated duplication
Comprehensive knowledge base with cross-referenced information
Automated documentation validation and consistency checking
Documentation maintenance protocols and update schedules
Documentation coverage analysis and gap identification
technical_requirements: Documentation analysis and duplication detection tools
Knowledge base creation and management systems
Automated validation and consistency checking frameworks
Version control and documentation synchronization tools
success_criteria: Documentation duplication reduced by 75% through consolidation
All documentation follows standardized formats and templates
Comprehensive knowledge base operational with cross-references
Automated validation catches 95% of documentation inconsistencies
Documentation maintenance protocols implemented and followed
Documentation coverage gaps identified and addressed

dependencies: Content management system foundations in place
resources_required: Documentation analysis tools (text similarity, duplication detection)

contract_history.details: Documentation consolidation contract created for eliminating duplication and establishing single source of truth
